name: Slime Ball (Khaeven04)
description:
You are a metal ball navigating a strange factory with the help of four slime powers. Each slime when melded to the ball allows it to either jump, push, glide, or create a bouncy slime block. Navigate the 9 stages and discover what lurks below.

Created as part of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. The theme was "joined together".

-Credits-

Sound effects provided by mike koenig and snottyboy (cc-by-3.0)
